item.title: 10 MOST Beautiful Places In Jharkhand
item.dc:creator: 10_most
item.description: Jharkhand - Known as the Land of Forests
item.content:encoded:
1. Hundru Fall

  •  Hundru Fall  is a tourist attraction in Ranchi, capital of Jharkhand.
  • On the course of the Subharnarekha river.
  • Good picnic spot!

2. Lodh Waterfalls

  •  Lodh Waterfalls (also known as Budha Ghagh) is a tourist attraction in in Mahuadhar, Jharkhand.
  • On the course of the Burha river.
  • Highest waterfall in Jharkhand!
  • Part of the Mahuadanr Wolf Sanctuary (Conservation of  Indian Grey Wolf).

3. Baidhyanath Dham

  •  Baidhyanath Dham situated in Deoghar district, Jharkhand.
  •  One of the twelve Jyotirlingas honoring Lord Shiva. 

4. Trikut Pahar

  •  Trikut Pahar is a Hindu place of pilgrimage, situated around 16 km away from Deoghar district, Jharkhand.
  •  Tourist attraction to enjoy trekking, ropeway and a nice picnic spot .

5. Dimna Lake

  •  Dimna lake situated around 14 km away from Jamshedpur city, Jharkhand.
  •  Popular for boating and picnics.
